Ukraine's frontline judges deliver justice under fireOlha Konoplenko's eastern Ukrainian city is occupied by Russian forces, but that hasn't stopped her from trying to uphold the law remotely as a judge. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 08:04:29 GMT 3P3KJKPSYZIPRBGHKC7WLTOZCU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraines-frontline-judges-deliver-justice-under-fire-2023-12-19/Thomas Peter, Dan Peleschuk世界欧洲
Large Icelandic volcano eruption misses local townLava from a large volcanic eruption in Iceland appeared to flow away from the only town in the area. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:43:41 GMT YXXIA4L2MVKKNANGP5JRKHMRWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/large-icelandic-volcano-eruption-misses-local-town-2023-12-19/Reuters世界欧洲
Rare smog puts Sydney on par with New Delhi as bushfires rageAir quality in Sydney plummeted on Tuesday to levels among the world's worst as smoke from bushfires in the north blanketed the harbour city, taking large swathes into index ranges on par with New Delhi, one of the world's most crowded capitals. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:37:31 GMT D76DRQBIMBMHHGGT4IZE3KBEII https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rare-smog-puts-sydney-par-with-new-delhi-bushfires-rage-2023-12-19/Lewis Jackson世界亚太地区
Shippers mask positions, weigh options amid Red Sea attacksA number of container ships are anchored in the Red Sea and others have turned off tracking systems as traders adjust routes and prices in response to maritime attacks by Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on the world's main East-West trade route. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 07:22:56 GMT 4WPTDGZBHRITTCN6W5FZGAYRRM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/shippers-mask-positions-weigh-options-amid-red-sea-attacks-2023-12-19/Florence Tan, Lisa Barrington世界中东
South Korea's Yoon picks new foreign minister, spy agency chiefSouth Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol picked on Tuesday former vice foreign minister Cho Tae-yul as the country's new foreign minister and national security advisor Cho Tae-yong as the new spy chief, Yoon's office said. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 06:25:03 GMT BX5IIC6ZGFJKZLQNZICKLFWGAI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-koreas-yoon-picks-new-foreign-minister-spy-agency-chief-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Diplomatic pressure builds over Hong Kong democrat Jimmy Lai's security trialInternational pressure was building over a landmark national security trial in Hong Kong for leading China critic Jimmy Lai, with British authorities calling for consular access to the jailed democrat as his trial entered its second day on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 04:57:46 GMT XR6MQUPIUNJNCTLOUAFEPENUM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/diplomatic-Pressure-builds-over-hong-kong-democrat-jimmy-lais-security-Trial-2023-12-19/James Pomfret, Jessie Pang世界中国
Bangladesh protesters set train on fire amid opposition strikeProtesters in Bangladesh set a train ablaze on Tuesday, killing four people, among them a mother and child, amid a countrywide strike called by the opposition to press its demand for the government to resign ahead of next month's general elections. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 04:49:51 GMT LMAUA7MRLFJU5HC6BWPR2CXK6U https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/bangladesh-train-blaze-kills-four-opposition-calls-strike-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Mexican poultry farmers warn US-Mexico rail bridges closure will impact tradeMexican poultry farmers warned of consequences to international trade on Monday and called on their government to intervene after the U.S. closed two rail bridges in Texas to stem a surge in migration. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 04:01:08 GMT RNX2REVLCNMKJDVTJL5BLPAIOI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/mexican-poultry-farmers-warn-us-mexico-rail-bridges-closure-will-impact-trade-2023-12-19/Reuters世界美洲
Setting aside tensions, Taiwan president offers aid to China after deadly quakeTaiwan President Tsai Ing-wen expressed condolences to China on Tuesday and offered her government's help after an earthquake killed more than 100 people on the northern edge of the Qinghai-Tibetan plateau. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 03:55:02 GMT RRN4WP4YXRMMRLLTLCGAWNKL5I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/setting-aside-tensions-taiwan-president-offers-aid-china-after-deadly-quake-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Troops on South Korean side re-arm at border village amid tensions with NorthInternational troops stationed on the South Korean side of the truce village of Panmunjom on the border with North Korea who had been unarmed can resume carrying guns, the United Nations Command (UNC) said on Tuesday. Tue, 19 Dec 2023 03:24:37 GMT DZJOMZZODZNR3PDWDNZKECQJX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/troops-south-korean-side-re-arm-border-village-amid-tensions-with-north-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
Philippines president says diplomatic efforts with China heading 'in poor direction'Philippines President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said a "paradigm shift" was needed in how his country approaches the South China Sea issue, as diplomatic efforts with Beijing were headed "in a poor direction". Tue, 19 Dec 2023 03:00:23 GMT SEO5YQJ7GRI2NMI5K2DGNDGNXM https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/philippines-president-says-diplomatic-efforts-with-china-heading-poor-direction-2023-12-19/Reuters世界亚太地区
